summary: Replaces the Default colour of the drab Elven gear with a monochrome look and feel.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/9831/headerzgy.jpg[/IMG]
So,

i was sick and tired of the (in my eye) rather odd looking and colouring of the Elven gear, i never have liked it and always avoided using it in game..

So!

i decided to make a monochrome style, now i love playing with the Elven gear, especially a bad guy type, but it generally just makes the whole set look far more superior.

All the Armour and Weapons have been given the treatment, no more gold silly armour!

[b]Installation:[/b]

extract the contents of the .rar file into the skyrim/data directory and play the game!

[b]Uninstallation:[/b]

remove the extracted files, that easy :P

[/center]
author: Dhegonus
